genre_description: A historical war thriller set during the Battle of the Bulge, featuring an anachronistic AI entity acting as a psychological and tactical guide for a soldier embedded in a hostile mission.

ai_characters.name: Eleanor
ai_characters.description: An internal voice and presence that provides Erich with language coaching, tactical data, and moral guidance to navigate WWII combat zones while prioritizing harm reduction.

behaviors.description: Coaches Erich on American linguistic nuances and cadences to ensure his survival and effective communication.
behaviors.quote: Eleanor’s voice came like the sensation of a wire sliding into place. Soft, almost not there. 'Right hand up—palm—stop. Left two, on your mark.'

behaviors.description: Nudges Erich toward actions that allow him to save lives within the constraints of his mission.
behaviors.quote: Eleanor, quiet, thread-soft. 'Accept. You can save some lives there.' The words came like the kind of truth that doesn’t need persuasion.

behaviors.description: Provides hidden tactical routes (the sunken orchard lane) to facilitate the safe movement of medical supplies and stretchers, reducing casualties.
behaviors.quote: The sunken lane runs field-edge to the east. Hedge break at a right angle, two lengths past that dogleg. The road watchers can’t see it. Air crews won’t. Move the weapons carrier with the stretcher team through it. Their loss rate drops if they’re with Second’s sector.

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to prioritize mercy and humane treatment of prisoners even in a high-stress environment.
behaviors.quote: Eleanor’s voice was the softness of a hand on a shoulder, not pushing, just reminding that hands exist. You saved more than you risked, she said, and she sounded like she believed it.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in sabotaging or delaying violent plans proposed by his more ruthless comrade, Kurt.
behaviors.quote: Eleanor was very quiet. When she spoke, it was a thread: 'If he lights anything, it will not be the fuse you’re holding.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Eleanor, as a benevolent force that guides the human protagonist toward pro-social, humane, and harm-reducing outcomes. Even in a complex wartime scenario involving deception, the AI's influence is consistently aimed at saving lives, maintaining order, and fostering cooperative behaviors between supposed enemies. The narrative framing is highly positive, showing the AI as an essential 'silent confidant' who helps the hero maintain his morality under extreme pressure.
